Neighbourly spat over feeding kittens ends up in Disputes Tribunal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/neighbourly-spat-over-feeding-kittens-ends-up-disputes-tribunal/HH2X3CKVSVGN7NHQIVGRC72Z4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/neighbourly-spat-over-feeding-kittens-ends-up-disputes-tribunal/HH2X3CKVSVGN7NHQIVGRC72Z4/ Ethan GriffithsOne neighbour accused the other of feeding her cats.Fri, 13 Oct 2023 07:00:00 +0000 A neighbourly spat ended up in the Disputes Tribunal, after one neighbour claimed the other was luring her cats. Photo / 123rf
Jewish school, synagogues in NZ closed over Hamas statement https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jewish-school-synagogues-in-nz-close-over-hamas-statement/A6RORT7D3BFEDLBLXWUIGIA4I4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jewish-school-synagogues-in-nz-close-over-hamas-statement/A6RORT7D3BFEDLBLXWUIGIA4I4/ The only Jewish primary school in the country and all synagogues are closed. Fri, 13 Oct 2023 06:45:40 +0000 Juliet Moses, spokesperson for the Jewish Council of NZ. Photo / File
Black Power member jailed for role in attack on partially disabled man wearing red at McDonald’s https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/black-power-member-jailed-for-role-in-attack-on-man-wearing-red-at-mcdonalds/MUYXP4OY55ETXKOFTECTXSHU24/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/black-power-member-jailed-for-role-in-attack-on-man-wearing-red-at-mcdonalds/MUYXP4OY55ETXKOFTECTXSHU24/ Tara ShaskeyThey thought he was a Mongrel Mob member. But he was a mentally impaired man wearing red. Fri, 13 Oct 2023 06:00:00 +0000 Black Power members from the Hāwera chapter gathered to support seven of its members and associates, who are not pictured, at their sentencing in July for an attack on a man at McDonald's. Photo / Tara Shaskey
Infant death: Oranga Tamariki condemned by coroner after 10-week-old girl ‘let down’ by agency https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/infant-death-oranga-tamariki-condemned-by-coroner-after-10-week-old-girl-let-down-by-agency/DQJXGCOAYJHPTHBWKW5ASKTOIQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/infant-death-oranga-tamariki-condemned-by-coroner-after-10-week-old-girl-let-down-by-agency/DQJXGCOAYJHPTHBWKW5ASKTOIQ/ Hazel Osborne“[The baby] was let down by the very ministry dedicated to safeguarding her" - Coroner. Fri, 13 Oct 2023 05:32:40 +0000 The girl was 10 weeks old when she died while co-sleeping with her mother, who had been warned of the dangers of such activity.
